explanation (cot): Oncotic pressure of the fluid leaving the capillaries is more than that of fluid entering it because proteins are held back, glucose concentration in the capillaries is same as that in glomerular filtrate, constriction of afferent arteriole increases blood flow to the glomerulus, and hematocrit of the fluid leaving the capillaries is more than that entering it.
